mapper.select: SELECT T.KPI_CODE, T.KPI_NAME, T.DISMANT_FORMULA,T.DISMANT_FLAG FROM UO_KPI_LIST_CONFIG T WHERE T.DIAG_FLAG = 'Y'
SELECT KPI_CODE, KPI_NAME, DISMANT_PART1_CODE, DISMANT_PART1_NAME, DISMANT_PART2_CODE, DISMANT_PART2_NAME FROM UO_KPI_DISMANT_CONFIG WHERE KPI_CODE =#{kpiCode}
SELECT DIM_CODE, DIM_NAME, VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_SQL FROM UO_DIM_LIST_CONFIG WHERE DIAG_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC
SELECT DIM_CODE, DIM_NAME, VALUE_TYPE, VALUE_SQL FROM UO_DIM_LIST_CONFIG WHERE REASON_FLAG = 'Y' ORDER BY ORDER_NO ASC
SELECT VALUE_CODE,VALUE_DESC FROM UO_DIM_VALUES_CONFIG WHERE DIM_CODE=#{dimCode} ORDER BY ORDER_NO DESC
SELECT TEMPLATE_CODE, TEMPLATE_NAME, REASON_KPI_CODE, REASON_KPI_NAME, REASON_KPI_ORDER, TEMPLATE_ORDER FROM UO_REASON_TEMPLATE_CONFIG
